divs: Sighting DetailsI heard a loud roaring I looked out my window, I saw a solid gray,black object traveling tree top level or lower. It had lights in front, it was the size of a van. I watched it go for about 3 to 4 minutes. It was like a small box with length of a van.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Doraville
There were no other sightings in Doraville on or around December 4th 2012
Summary: saw a solid object traveling about 40 mps, tree top level.
